body_content.explanation: the system of trade and industry by which the wealth of a country is made and used:
examples: Technology companies are driving the global economy.
Investors remain cautious about the state of the economy.
Tourism can help to boost a weak economy.
A strong economy results in higher property prices.
Tourism contributes millions of pounds to the local economy.

body_content.explanation: the intentional saving of money or, less commonly, the saving of time, energy, words, etc.:
examples: They've had to make economies since Nathan lost his job.
This can be done by machines with more speed and economy.
She writes with such economy - I've never known a writer say so much in so few words.
